```{r}
sn_data <- read.csv("C:/Users/crost/Desktop/schneider-electric/dataset.csv", header = TRUE, sep = ",", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
```

```{r}
sn_data
```

```{r}
summary(sn_data)
```

```{r}
c('Deviance'           = m0_logit$deviance,
  'Degrees of freedom' = m0_logit$df.res)

c('Deviance'           = m0_probit$deviance,
  'Degrees of freedom' = m0_probit$df.res)

c('Deviance'           = m0_cloglog$deviance,
  'Degrees of freedom' = m0_cloglog$df.res)
```




```{r}
m0_logit <- glm(target_variable ~ product_A_sold_in_the_past + product_C + cust_hitrate + cust_interactions + cust_contracts + opp_old + competitor_Z + cust_in_iberia + , data = sn_data, family = binomial(link= "logit"))
summary(m0_logit)
```

```{r}
m0_probit <- glm(target_variable ~ product_A_sold_in_the_past + product_C + cust_hitrate + cust_interactions + cust_contracts + opp_old + competitor_Z + cust_in_iberia, data = sn_data, family = binomial(link= "probit"))
summary(m0_probit)
```

```{r}
m0_cloglog <- glm(target_variable ~ product_A_sold_in_the_past + product_C + cust_hitrate + cust_interactions + cust_contracts + opp_old + competitor_Z + cust_in_iberia, data = sn_data, family = binomial(link= "cloglog"))
summary(m0_cloglog)
```

```{r}
Anova(m0_logit, test.statistic = 'LR')
Anova(m0_probit, test.statistic = 'LR')
Anova(m0_cloglog, test.statistic = 'LR')
```
